name: ptb-utilities
tagline: A collection of MATLAB functions for performing some common actions using the stimulus presentation software Psychophysics Toolbox.
body:
# Psychtoolbox Utilities

## About
A collection of utility functions for performing some common actions using the stimulus presentation software Psychophysics Toolbox Version 3 (PTB-3). For more information on PTB-3, see [their wiki](http://psychtoolbox.org/HomePage). Some of these functions were inspired by functions written by Dr. Emily Falk, who is awesome and has an [awesome lab website]( href="http://cn.asc.upenn.edu/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
